text: Von Neumann machine may refer to: * Von Neumann architecture, a conceptual model of nearly all computer architecture * IAS machine, a computer designed in the 1940s based on von Neumann's design * Self-replicating machine, a class of machines that can replicate themselves ** Universal constructor (disambiguation) ** Von Neumann probes, hypothetical space probes capable of self-replication ** Nanorobots, capable of self-replication * The Von Neumann cellular automaton
title: Von Neumann machine
